A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I stood in line for the original Star Wars movie back in 1977. I was 7 years old and  was an instant fan. So I'm no nube when it comes to the Star Wars galaxy. I gauge a movie by my desire to see it again. I left not wanting to. Super disappointed. There are definitely fun parts to this movie but there is just so many points about this movie that just made it bad. Hard to imagine why it scored so high with the critics. Oh well\, crossing my fingers for the last one.
